description.value: Before you make an attack roll with a melee weapon, melee spell attack, or Unarmed Strike with which you are proficient, you can choose to forgo your Proficiency Bonus to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you can use your Bonus Action make a breath weapon attack. When you use your breath weapon, each creature in a 15 foot cone originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw. The DC for this saving throw is 8 plus your Proficiency Bonus plus the modifier used to hit with the melee weapon attack, melee spell attack, or Unarmed Strike. A creature takes your choice of Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison damage equal to twice your Proficiency Bonus on a failed saving throw, or half as much on a success.

activation.condition: when you hit with an attack where you decided to forgo your proficiency modifier
